com.example.hbaltz.aton.rajawali.renderables

Class Trajectory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.rajawali3d.ATransformable3D
      • org.rajawali3d.Object3D
        • com.example.hbaltz.aton.rajawali.renderables.Trajectory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<org.rajawali3d.Object3D>, org.rajawali3d.scenegraph.IGraphNodeMember, org.rajawali3d.visitors.INode

    public class Trajectory
extends org.rajawali3d.Object3D
    Rajawali object showing the Trajectory of the Project Tango device in 3D space. Points are added when the trajectory is updated by passing translation data obtained from Tango Pose Data.
